header.value: Origin, X-Requested-With, Accept, apikey, Content-Type, Cache-Control

query.description: Page number, starting from 0.
(Required) Number of elements per page. Greater than 0.
Used for searching for specific Tasks by name.

Required when the updated_to is set. Used in conjunction with the updated_to to filter the tasks by the last updated date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSSZ, e.g., 2022-10-28T05:41:43.620792Z. The updated_from cannot be later than the updated_to.

Required when the updated_from is set. Used in conjunction with the updated_from to filter the tasks by the last updated date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSSZ, e.g., 2022-11-28T05:41:43.620792Z. The updated_to cannot be earlier than the updated_from.
Optional. Used to filter Tasks with specifics status(es). An empty list implies no filtering (none) is desired.
Optional. Used to filter Tasks with specifics status(es). An empty list implies no filtering (none) is desired.

Optional. Used to filter Tasks with specific associated sensors. An empty value implies no filtering is desired.
Example: 00074DDDA28C
Used to sort tasks by field. Default Sort Field enum is SORT_FIELD_NAME.
Used to sort tasks by the specified order direction. ASC is the default order.

variable.description: (Required) The Serial Number of the sensor which you want to unenroll

request.description: Requests sensor unenrollment by the sensor serial number provided. Currently, unenrollments are only supported by the ZB200 Bridge. In the future, the ZSFinder Android service will also support them.

item.name: Retrieve sensor read events by task

query.description: Date-time timestamp of records newer than the time provided in Zulu format.
Date-time timestamp of records not occurring before the time provided in Zulu format. Maximum range must not be more then 30 days.
Maximum number of records to return. Default is 500. Use the cursor to get additional pages of records. Must be an integer between 1 and 14000 inclusive.
Enter the 'nextCursor' from the previous page.  A guid index for the next page of events based on the previous limit.
Provide the `sensorTaskId` to filter your results by sensor.
Filter task data within event data by a reader `deviceId`.

variable.description: (Required) The ID number of the task.

request.description: Retrieves temperature records, alarms, upload times, and locations based on the `taskId` you provide. You can limit the events retrieved by a time period you dictate. By default will return the most recent 500 log entries from the last month in descending timestamp order
